Tyrael received the message. A smile crept slowly to his face.

Tyrael: Glad to hear you're here, General. Our ship has gone critical 
and will soon be dust any cycle now. I've sent the pods out so we can 
use them later. The Tripredacus, Maximals and a rogue band of 
Predacons have joined forces to bring a merged version of Megatron and 
Galvatron down. Seeing you're here, my alliance with these factions is 
likely to end when this is over. I ask of you not to intervene unless 
I specifically request it.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> Blackheart stared at the scannes. "I see maybe 4 bases....this is 
> complicated. A ship is airborn..but it seems not for long. Its a 
tripred 
> ship. The predacons are obviously out matched but they seem to be 
> surviving.....they must be worthy opponents." Blackheart had one 
> weakness...the thrill of a challenge. "Send a comm to the 
Tripreds...if im 
> not mistake thats Tyrael....I thought hed be dead by now. Tell them 
our 
> position around the moon and that we wish to speak to them whenever 
their 
> battle is over...I dont think we should intervene just yet...not 
until we 
> know what were dealing with."
